title: Permatex 09103 Automotive Windshield Repair Kit For Chipped And Cracked Windshields. Permanent Air-Tight Repairs, With Repair Syringe & Plunger, 9-piece Kit
description: Permatex’s Windshield Repair Kit makes permanent air-tight repairs of bullseye damage up to 1 1/4″ on most laminated windshield glass. This state-of-the-art delivery system with advanced spring-lock feature, allows you to make professional-quality repairs with no mixing required, and it cures by natural daylight. This complete kit provides everything needed for the repair including easy-to-follow instructions with photographs.
